Package aas_core.aas3_0.types.model

Interface IReferable

All Superinterfaces:
IClass, IHasExtensions
All Known Subinterfaces:
IAnnotatedRelationshipElement, IAssetAdministrationShell, IBasicEventElement, IBlob, ICapability, IConceptDescription, IDataElement, IEntity, IEventElement, IFile, IIdentifiable, IMultiLanguageProperty, IOperation, IProperty, IRange, IReferenceElement, IRelationshipElement, ISubmodel, ISubmodelElement, ISubmodelElementCollection, ISubmodelElementList
All Known Implementing Classes:
AnnotatedRelationshipElement, AssetAdministrationShell, BasicEventElement, Blob, Capability, ConceptDescription, EnhancedAnnotatedRelationshipElement, EnhancedAssetAdministrationShell, EnhancedBasicEventElement, EnhancedBlob, EnhancedCapability, EnhancedConceptDescription, EnhancedEntity, EnhancedFile, EnhancedMultiLanguageProperty, EnhancedOperation, EnhancedProperty, EnhancedRange, EnhancedReferenceElement, EnhancedRelationshipElement, EnhancedSubmodel, EnhancedSubmodelElementCollection, EnhancedSubmodelElementList, Entity, File, MultiLanguageProperty, Operation, Property, Range, ReferenceElement, RelationshipElement, Submodel, SubmodelElementCollection, SubmodelElementList
public interface IReferable extends IHasExtensions
An element that is referable by its getIdShort().

This ID is not globally unique. This ID is unique within the name space of the element.

Constraints:

  • Constraint AASd-022: getIdShort() of non-identifiable referables within the same name space shall be unique (case-sensitive).

  • Method Details

    • getCategory

      Optional<String> getCategory()
      The category is a value that gives further meta information w.r.t. to the class of the element. It affects the expected existence of attributes and the applicability of constraints.

      The category is not identical to the semantic definition (IHasSemantics) of an element. The category e.g. could denote that the element is a measurement value whereas the semantic definition of the element would denote that it is the measured temperature.

    • setCategory

      void setCategory(String category)

    • getIdShort

      Optional<String> getIdShort()
      In case of identifiables this attribute is a short name of the element. In case of referable this ID is an identifying string of the element within its name space.

      In case the element is a property and the property has a semantic definition (IHasSemantics.getSemanticId()) conformant to IEC61360 the getIdShort() is typically identical to the short name in English.

    • setIdShort

      void setIdShort(String idShort)

    • getDisplayName

      Optional<List<ILangStringNameType>> getDisplayName()
      Display name. Can be provided in several languages.

    • setDisplayName

      void setDisplayName(List<ILangStringNameType> displayName)

    • getDescription

      Optional<List<ILangStringTextType>> getDescription()
      Description or comments on the element.

      The description can be provided in several languages.

      If no description is defined, then the definition of the concept description that defines the semantics of the element is used.

      Additional information can be provided, e.g., if the element is qualified and which qualifier types can be expected in which context or which additional data specification templates are provided.

    • setDescription

      void setDescription(List<ILangStringTextType> description)

    • overDisplayNameOrEmpty

      Iterable<ILangStringNameType> overDisplayNameOrEmpty()
      Iterate over displayName, if set, and otherwise return an empty enumerable.

    • overDescriptionOrEmpty

      Iterable<ILangStringTextType> overDescriptionOrEmpty()
      Iterate over description, if set, and otherwise return an empty enumerable.
